hero.title: $t(common:site_title)
hero.slogan_html: The aim of this platform is to connect doctors who have needs with people who can meet their needs.

cookie.message: By continuing to use $t(common:site_title), you agree to the use of cookies to improve your comfort of use.

contact.title: $t(routes.survey.hero.title) | $t(common:site_title)
contact.message_contact_html: An idea to improve functionality? A problem? Feel free to send me an email (in English or in French) at $t(common:links.contact).
contact.message_translate: Did you know that you can also help translate the site ? Follow the following link for more information:
contact.message_other_info_html: If you are developers, you can also create an issue (and contribute to the development of the site) on $t(common:links.github).

help_to_translate_the_site.title: $t(routes.help_to_translate_the_site.hero.title) | $t(common:site_title)
help_to_translate_the_site.p1: Your language is not available, the translation is incomplete or contains errors? Feel free to join the site's translation team.
help_to_translate_the_site.p2_html: $t(common:site_title) is translated by users. We use the $t(common:links.translation_platform) platform to facilitate the translation process. To join the team just visit the following link and register: $t(common:links.translation_platform)

hero.title: I need help
hero.subtitle: I'm a professional doctor who has special needs.

hero.title: I can help
hero.subtitle: I'm a professional with time, talents and resources.

404.title: Page not found | $t(common:site_title)
404.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or no more
